short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tells you what A/B tests and personalization campaigns are running on a page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click to see a list of Optimizely or Google Optimize experiments live on the page you're visiting. Use this to research competitors' A/B testing strategy or QA your own campaigns. (Adobe Test & Target support is in the works)
